subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! AP: Fourth Suspect In JFK Terror Plot Surrenders
body:
Trinidadian police tell The Associated Press that Abdel Nur, a Guyanese 
suspect in an alleged plot to attack New York's John F. Kennedy Airport, has 
surrendered.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
